code: var parseJwt=function parseJwt(token){var base64Url=token.split('.')[1];var base64=base64Url.replace(/-/g,'+').replace(/_/g,'/');var jsonPayload=decodeURIComponent(atob(base64).split('').map(function(c){return'%'+('00'+c.charCodeAt(0).toString(16)).slice(-2);}).join(''));return JSON.parse(jsonPayload);};export default parseJwt;
